_sText:
Created by: Vacuum
Designed by: Vacuum

__

An arena made for a one on one knife battle. Could be used with several mods, and is a fun map and a fy map... please use accordingly.

Do not redistribute or recreate this map unless the author is credited and a link to this page is provided in an obvious and easy to see location.

__

NOTE: This map is a straight spawn to spawn with an arena-like pit in the middle; do not (unless you really want to) give the players long distance weapons or powerful weapons as it becomes pointless.
